column2: Learned  Senior  State  Counsel  (SSC)  submits  to  court  the  following  submissions  to

column1: justify the lack of formal adoption.

column2: 2.  There are  no legal  obligations on  the  High Court Judge to explain  the rights
of the accused,  as  required  by Sections  196 and  200  of the Code  of Procedure
3.  If the accused  wants, he can  make the request to the Court.
